definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_makestopriding"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation" inline="false"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Fazhenentity</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">            for (int index0 = 0; index0 < 5; index0++) {&#10;                if (world instanceof ServerLevel _level) {&#10;                    double x, z;&#10;                    if (entity.getDirection() == Direction.NORTH || entity.getDirection() == Direction.SOUTH) {&#10;                        x = entity.getX() + (Math.random() * 2 - 1) * 5;&#10;                        z = entity.getZ() + (entity.getDirection() == Direction.NORTH ? 5 : -5);&#10;                    } else {&#10;                        x = entity.getX() + (entity.getDirection() == Direction.EAST ? 5 : -5);&#10;                        z = entity.getZ() + (Math.random() * 2 - 1) * 5;&#10;                    }&#10;                    double y = entity.getY() + (Math.random() * 2 - 1) * 5;&#10;                    Entity entityToSpawn = ExmoxlModEntities.FAZHENENTITY.get().spawn(_level, BlockPos.containing(x, y, z), MobSpawnType.MOB_SUMMONED);&#10;                    if (entityToSpawn != null) {&#10;                        entityToSpawn.getPersistentData().putString("owner", entity.getStringUUID());&#10;                    }&#10;                }&#10;            }</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
